org.modelmapper.builder

Interface ConfigurableConditionExpression<S,D>

  • Type Parameters:
    S - source type
    D - destination type
    All Superinterfaces:
    ConfigurableConverterExpression<S,D>, ConfigurableProviderExpression<S,D>, ReferenceMapExpression<S,D>

    public interface ConfigurableConditionExpression<S,D>
extends ConfigurableProviderExpression<S,D>
    Represents mapping operations.
